entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
